XML Resources

Developer News and Resources

  • XML.com
  • IBM Developerworks XML portal
  • OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards), which includes such member standards as AMQP, IDTrust, LegalXML, Data Center Markup Language (DCML), and e-gov solutions.

Standards and Vocabularies

Among its multiple uses, XML is also a metalanguage - a syntactic basis for defining further languages. Those languages are the applications themselves, and not to be confused with software applications containing code. Here are a few examples of essential XML vocabularies:

  • Darwin Information Typing Language (DITA) for technical documentation built by IBM
  • Text Encoding Initiative for machine-readable texts in the humanities, social sciences and linguistics
  • DocBook, a publishing language developed by O'Reilly
  • Math Markup Language (MathML) for expressing mathematical and scientific content
  • Resource Description Framework for describing collections of formalized statements about a Web resource
  • XSL Formatting Objects (XSL-FO) A great introductory article for XSL-FO can be found here
  • JATS (Journal Article Tag Suite) is an application of NISO Z39.96-2015, which defines a set of XML elements and attributes for tagging journal articles and describes three article models.

.NET XML Libraries and Projects

  • dotnet-transform-xdt is a .NET tool for applying XML Document Transformation to XML documents. Its most common application is to .NET configuration files, but can be applied anywhere.
  • RestSharp lets you quickly build HTTP and REST clients.
  • AngleSharp is a W3C compliant parser for HTML, CSS and scripting integration.
  • WiX Toolset for building MSI installers for the Windows installation engine.
  • EDI Tools for parsing EDI into XML
  • ServiceStack is a fully featured framework for APIs, microservices and web apps for .NET
  • XML-RPC is a library for implementing XML-RPC services and clients in .NET
  • XMLUnit for unit testing your XML
  • FsPickler - a fast, multi-format messaging serializer for .NET
  • Open XML SDK
  • XML in Visual Basic
  • XML Documents and Data from the .NET documentation

Tools and Editors

  • XML Notepad is a classic XML editor and content viewer.
  • Greg's XML Editor is similar to XML Notepad.
  • Open Live Writer is an open source blog editor that uses XML and XML-RPC for communicating with the publishing platform of your choice - or the one you're building...
  • TinyMCE is a fully-featured, customizable editor you can embed in your web application and generate all kinds of formats with.
  • CodeMirror is an embeddable text editor that includes key bindings for Vim, Emacs and Sublime Text, and is used in the dev tools for Firefox, Chrome, and Safari, among others.
  • CKEditor is commercial, feature-rich, embeddable editor you can use in your application, with support for article, document and inline editing.
  • Oxygen XML Editor for a suite of xml editing tools.
  • Altova has developer, XML, and XBRL tools for XML developers
  • Wikipedia has a detailed comparison list of several different javascript-based source code editors.
  • FontoXML is a web-based XML editor for authors with no knowledge of XML. They provide a free DITA XML editor that lets users save files in a OneDrive or Google Drive storage account. Their platform includes schema modules for DITA, TEI, XHTML, JATS and S1000D, but will support any XSD provided.

If you want to add a useful XML tool, component, or standard, contact us and let us know what we're missing!
